text:
_Has anyone used a JS testing library like Jest to test HubSpot functionality?_
Specifically I am testing that some functionality I added to the HubSpot Forms Embed `onFormReady` callback works as expected.
I have tried to instantiate `<https://js.hsforms.net/forms/v2.js>` by requiring it with `require('./path-to-v2.js')` but it is throwing this error: `Cannot read property 'PropTypes' of undefined`
